headline: Elon Musk Says Tesla's Optimus Will Be An 'Infinite Money Glitch' That Ends Poverty, Performs Surgery, And Looks So Real 'You'll Need To Poke It'
summary: Forget margins. Elon Musk wants to reinvent society with a robot that can walk, work, operate without sleep, and—according to him—perform surgery with precision so humanlike, you'll need to poke it just to make sure it's not a person in a suit. Speaking on Tesla Inc.'s (NASDAQ:TSLA) Q3 2025 earnings call last month, Musk doubled down on his sky-high ambitions for Optimus, the company's humanoid robot project. The Tesla CEO called it "an infinite money glitch," predicting it would not only become
